) } const profileButtonOpenPopup = document.querySelector('.profile__edit-button'); const profileButtonAddPopup = document.querySelector('.profile__add-button'); const profileAvatarPopup = document.querySelector('.profile__avatar-box'); const popupClose = document.querySelector('.popup__close-button'); function handleEditAvatarClick() { const profileAvatar = document.querySelector('.popup_apdate-avatar'); profileAvatar.classList.add('open_popup'); } function handleEditProfileClick() { const profileEdit = document.querySelector('.popup_edit-form'); profileEdit.classList.add('open_popup'); } function handleAddPlaceClick() { const placeAdd = document.querySelector('.popup_add-form'); placeAdd.classList.add('open_popup'); } const placeAdd = document.querySelector('.popup_add-form'); const openPopup = placeAdd.classList.add('open_popup') profileButtonOpenPopup.addEventListener('click', handleEditProfileClick); profileButtonAddPopup.addEventListener('click', handleAddPlaceClick); profileAvatarPopup.addEventListener('click', handleEditAvatarClick); export default Main
